message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $1,300,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am only willing to pay up to $1,200,000. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $1,250,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,225,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
